alert.note: Alert for Mahaska; Monroe; Poweshiek; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:54AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Monroe, southeastern Poweshiek, northern Wapello and Mahaska Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Pella to 11 miles west of Eddyville to near Albia. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oskaloosa and Eddyville around 310 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ottumwa Industrial Airport and Ottumwa. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 201 and 204. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south central and central Iowa.
